channel.title: AHHHH virus help (really need answer)
channel.description:
Hey well you know when you get virus and spyware , and little icons pop up on the bottom right hand corner saying you have spyware and it wants you to download all these virus scanners and crap..Well i ran virus scans , spyware and everything even keylogger! Well got rid of some of them and most of them but that stupid spylocker won't go away.. what the heck do i do i already uninstalled it but its still here!! And its pissing me off to no end!!!!BOut to ThroW My COMP OuT the FRIcken WINdoW!!!
HELLLLPP PLEASE!
But im getting new comp very soon so yeah..

item.title: AHHHH virus help (really need answer)
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Right click on your toolbar --> Properties–> By where it says show the clock click customize–>Then pick always hide for it, I think it shows up as unknown

Read full topic

item.title: AHHHH virus help (really need answer)
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

If it bugs you, or scared you might get into trouble, exit out of explorer and enter it again. I had this problem, but it gave away sometime.

item.title: AHHHH virus help (really need answer)
item.dc:creator: @jordan7 Jordan7
item.description:
@jordan7 wrote:

Mprules, guys I had the Exact same problem… You can’t remove it, I even tried contacting people. I had it for 2 months and it pissed me off. I had to wipe out my comp, so that’s probably all you can doo… AVG, Norton and all that crap doesn’t work on it. Soz mate, actually I just got it again I just hid the icon

Looks like this right ??

item.title: AHHHH virus help (really need answer)
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:3, topic:94578”]Try downloading actually virus scanners. SpyBot, AdAware, Nod32, and Kaspersky are some of my favrorites. If not, back up all the files you want and torrent a Windows Version for www.torrentspy.com and find a serial code for it on serials.ws. Then re-install Windows blah, blah, blah. Oh, try not to write in caps please, its really annoying.[/quote]Lol, serials.ws has huge porn ads, don’t go there. Just use Linux and you won’t have any problems. If you want to fix that computer and nothing helps then just format, or something.

Read full topic
